title: International Recruiter Shares What’s Happening In The Tech War For Talent - Forbes
content: International Recruiter Shares What’s Happening In The Tech War For Talent  Forbes
description: The internet is undergoing a drastic facelift, thanks to surging interest in Web3 and the metaverse. However, the journey to the internet of the future is so complex that companies are struggling to find people who can do the job.
